snippet: A girl’s pregnancy led to her being ousted from her home.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York helps teenage mother Lataja James to pay her rent at the Elinor Martin Residence for Mother and Child in New Rochelle, NY.
lead_paragraph: A girl’s pregnancy led to her being ousted from her home.

headline.seo: A Teenage Mother Gets Help, and Seeks Reconciliation
